abstractText: PitPro is a computer program produced by Columbia Basin Research that converts files downloaded from the Columbia Basin PIT Tag Information System (PTAGIS; https://ptagis.org) to the format needed for running SURPH (http://www.cbr.washington.edu/analysis/apps/surph) and ROSTER (http://www.cbr.washington.edu/analysis/apps/roster). PitPro can also produce travel-time and Cormack-Jolly-Seber survival estimates from PIT tag interrogation data.
title: File conversion, travel-time and survival estimation with the software program PitPro v1.0
